sentence.Network_en: The kitten wormed its way through the just-open door.
sentence.Network_cn: 小猫缩着身子从刚开了一点儿的门中挤过来。

sentence.Network_en: They accused him of riding on the coat-tails of the president.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们指责他是沾了总统的光。

sentence.Network_en: The kitten was curled on a cushion on the sofa.
sentence.Network_cn: 那只小猫在沙发垫子上蜷缩成了一团。

means.word_mean: 1. a plant of the genus Besseya having fluffy spikes of flowers

auth_sentence.content: But in the meantime, no more kitten videos.

auth_sentence.content: In fact, we're pinning tails on donkeys.

auth_sentence.content: The mother purrs so the kitten can locate her.
